Merging of Token to one Line.

Method Detail

init

private void init()

filterToken

public Token filterToken(Token token)
                  throws TokenizerException
Filters a TokenStream.

All Token will be filtered out until a Sentence Token occures. Then all filtered token will be merged together and will be handled as one Token. If no Sentence Token occures, there won't be filtered any Token.

Specified by:
filterToken in interface ITokenFilter
Specified by:
filterToken in class BaseTokenFilter
Parameters:
token - the filter
Returns:
the filter token or null
Throws:
TokenizerException - if the tokenizer has a problem...
See Also:
ITokenFilter.filterToken(org.dotplot.tokenizer.Token)
